description: Set lock status for a division template
Sets the stability to the country in scope
Sets a temp variable to a value or another variable
Sets a truce between scope country and target for days duration.
Set unit leader flag
Sets the war support to the country in scope.
Start a border war between two states
example: start_border_war = { change_state_after_war = no attacker = { state = 527 num_provinces = 4 on_win = japan_border_conflict.2 on_lose = japan_border_conflict.3 on_cancel = japan_border_conflict.4 } defender = { state = 408 num_provinces = 4 on_win = japan_border_conflict.3 on_lose = japan_border_conflict.2 on_cancel = japan_border_conflict.4 } }
default_outcome:
= { change_state_after_war = no 
 attacker = { state = STATEID 
 num_provinces = 4 
 on_win = japan_border_conflict.2 #Event on win 
 on_lose = japan_border_conflict.3 #Event on loss 
 on_cancel = japan_border_conflict.4 #Event on cancel 
 } 
 defender = { state = STATEID 
 num_provinces = 4 
 on_win = japan_border_conflict.3 #Even on win 
 on_lose = japan_border_conflict.2 #Even on loss 
 on_cancel = japan_border_conflict.4 #Event on cancel 
 } }
